Package griffon.util

Groovy specific utility classes

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BuilderCustomizer  
    CompositeResourceBundleBuilder  
    ServiceLoaderUtils.LineProcessor  
    ServiceLoaderUtils.PathFilter  
    ServiceLoaderUtils.ResourceProcessor  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMapResourceBundle  
    AnnotationUtils  
    BindUtils
    Helper class for constructing bindings between two objects.
    BindUtils.BindingBuilder  
    CollectionUtils
    Utility class that simplifies creating collections in Java.
    CollectionUtils.ListBuilder<E>  
    CollectionUtils.MapBuilder<K,V>  
    CollectionUtils.SetBuilder<E>  
    CompositeBuilder  
    CompositeResourceBundle  
    ConfigUtils
    Utility class for reading configuration properties.
    ExpandableResourceBundle  
    GriffonApplicationUtils
    Assorted utility methods and constants.
    GriffonClassUtils
    Class containing utility methods for dealing with Griffon class artifacts.
    GriffonNameUtils
    Contains utility methods for converting between different name types, for example from class names -> property names and vice-versa.
    MethodDescriptor  
    MethodUtils
    Utility reflection methods focussed on methods in general rather than properties in particular.
    ServiceLoaderUtils  
    TypeUtils
    Utility class for dealing with type conversions.
    Xml2Groovy
    Translates an XML file into a Groovy script that is suitable for a Groovy builder.

Package griffon.util Description
